Query: How to remove an audio track from an mp4 video file?

Answers.Most Similar TLDR Task: Remux MKV video to MP4 without re-encoding audio or video streams

Top-3 Scripts:
au_1139812: ffmpeg -i INPUT_FILE.EXT

ffmpeg -i INPUT_FILE.EXT -map 0:2 OUTPUT_FILE.EXT

man ffmpeg

au_977162: ffmpeg  -t 00:11:00 -i input.mp4 -map 0 -c copy segment1.mp4
ffmpeg -ss 00:11:10 -i input.mp4 -map 0 -c copy segment2.mp4

ffmpeg -f concat -i input.txt -map 0 -c copy output.mp4

ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -filter_complex \
  "[0:v]trim=end=660,setpts=N/FRAME_RATE/TB[v0]; \
   [0:a]atrim=end=660,asetpts=N/SR/TB[a0]; \
   [0:v]trim=start=670,setpts=N/FRAME_RATE/TB[v1]; \
   [0:a]atrim=start=670,asetpts=N/SR/TB[a1]; \
   [v0][a0][v1][a1]concat=n=2:v=1:a=1[v][a]" \
  -map "[v]" -map "[a]" output.mp4

au_706933: ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -vf \
"delogo=x=10:y=120:w=1:h=1, \
 delogo=x=862:y=438:w=1:h=1, \
 delogo=x=56:y=207:w=1:h=1, \
 delogo=x=1259:y=943:w=1:h=1" \
-c:a copy cleaned-output.mp4

ffmpeg -i input -ss 5 -vframes 1 output.png

Explanations about Options.-filter_complex:
Define a complex filtergraph, i.e. one with arbitrary number of inputs and/or outputs.
 For simple graphs - those with one input and one output of the same type - see the
 -filter options. filtergraph is a description of the filtergraph, as described in the
 ``Filtergraph syntax'' section of the ffmpeg-filters manual.

Answers.Most Similar TLDR Task: Display the frame rate of a video
Top-3 Similar Questions: au_648603: How to create an animated GIF from MP4 video via command line?
au_1163088: How to list all mp4 files with HDp60 (to separate them from p30)?
Top-3 Scripts:
au_1163088: ffprobe -v error -select_streams \
v -of default=noprint_wrappers=1:nokey=1 \
-show_entries stream=r_frame_rate <your-filename>.mp4

for videofile in *.mp4; do
 echo -n "$videofile\t"
 ffprobe -v error -select_streams v \
 -of default=noprint_wrappers=1:nokey=1 \
 -show_entries stream=r_frame_rate $videofile

find -name '*.mp4' -printf '%p\t' \
-exec ffprobe -v error -select_streams \
v -of default=noprint_wrappers=1:nokey=1  \
-show_entries stream=r_frame_rate {} \;
